item.title: A Beginner's Tutorial to PHP for WordPress Development on Site Bay
item.description: external_resources: ‘The WordPress Codex’ aliases: [’/development/php/beginners-tutorial-to-php/’] Introduction PHP isn’t just any programming language; it’s the engine behind WordPress, powering all those dynamic features on your Site Bay hosted site.

item.title: The Pros and Cons of Site Bay
item.description: Site Bay has emerged as a key player in the realm of WordPress hosting, especially for those seeking the power of Kubernetes combined with the insights of Posthog analytics and the visual prowess of Grafana dashboards.
